conbody.p: core RPM installinstalling additional librariesInstall additional libraries to use stages that are not included in the core installation. This is an optional step, but generally you'll want to install additional libraries to process data.
For a complete list of the stages installed with each stage library, see .
Use the following commands to install additional libraries:

dlentry.dt: To install one or more stage libraries:
dlentry.dd: Use the following command to install the stage libraries downloaded to the current directory:
Use the full name of the library package that you want to install, separating them with commas. Do not include spaces in the command.

For example, to install the Amazon S3 origin and destination, as well as the Elasticsearch destination for Elasticsearch 1.6.2 for version 2.0.0.0, use the following command: yum localinstall streamsets-datacollector-aws-lib-2.0.0.0-1.noarch.rpm,streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_1_6-lib-2.0.0.0-1.noarch.rpm

dlentry.dt: To list the stage libraries installed on the current :
dlentry.dd: Use the following command:yum list installed | grep streamsets
Use the full name of the libraries that you want to uninstall, separating them with commas. Do not include spaces in the command.
For example, to uninstall the Amazon S3 origin and destination, use the following command:yum remove streamsets-datacollector-aws-lib
